Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.server.gameLogic

Class Game

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.server.gameLogic.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
FriendGame, OnlineGame
public abstract class Game extends Object
This abstract class represents a game in the server.
